Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.service

Interface GenomeAssemblyService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CRUDService<Long,​GenomeAssembly>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenomeAssemblyServiceImpl
    public interface GenomeAssemblyService
extends CRUDService<Long,​GenomeAssembly>
    A service for storing and retrieving GenomeAssembly entities.

    • Method Summary
